sourcesContent:
<script>
   import Window from "@/components/window/Window.vue";
   import Input from "@/components/Input.vue";

   export default {
      components: { Window, Input },
      emits: ["callback-cancel", "callback-change"],
      props: {
         value: { type: Object, default: null },
      },
      data() {
         return {
            customerName: "",
            customerPhoneNumber: "",
         };
      },
      watch: {
         value: function () {
            this.onNewValue();
         },
      },
      methods: {
         onNewValue() {
            const value = this.value !== null ? this.value : {};
            this.customerName = value.name;
            this.customerPhoneNumber = value.phoneNumber;
         },
         onChange() {
            this.$emit("callback-change", {
               name: this.customerName,
               phoneNumber: this.customerPhoneNumber,
            });
         },
      },
   };
</script>

<template>
   <Window
      class="WindowCustomer"
      title="Edit Customer"
      @click-cancel="$emit('callback-cancel')"
      @click-ok="onChange"
   >
      <Input
         class="WindowCustomer-input"
         label="Name"
         :isRequired="true"
         :bindValue="customerName"
         @input="(comp) => (customerName = comp.value)"
      />
      <Input
         class="WindowCustomer-input"
         label="Phone Number"
         type="tel"
         :bindValue="customerPhoneNumber"
         @input="(comp) => (customerPhoneNumber = comp.value)"
      />
   </Window>
</template>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
   .WindowCustomer {
      max-width: 100%;
      width: 35rem;

      .WindowCustomer-input {
         font-size: 1rem;
         border: none;
         background: hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.03);
         border-bottom: 1px solid hsl(0, 0%, 70%);
         border-radius: 0.2rem;
         padding: 0.6rem 0.4rem;
         margin-top: 2rem;
      }
   }
</style>
